name: Trade Post Forest
description:
Trade Post Forest is a game about a successful trade post in the middle of the woods. You will come across abandoned locations that are much friendlier during the daytime. Collect key-cards to gain access to locked areas within the trade post, and find tools that will help you along your way. Discover what was going on in the trade post and where everyone has gone.

Features:
  • Explore an open world with several destinations to discover
  • Collect every coffee mug in the world
  • Find tools to access different areas of the trade post
  • Wander around in the dark woods surrounding the trade post
  • Explore an endlessly generating forest maze if you stray too far from the beaten path
  • Find secrets and clues hidden throughout the world

Don't get lost.
